apps

Class TwitterApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • apps.TwitterApp

  • public class TwitterApp
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Twitter Aplication. It uses twitter4j library.
    Author:
    ES1-2018-EIC2-11

      • TwitterApp

        public TwitterApp()
           throws twitter4j.TwitterException
        Constructor of the TwitterApp. It uses an Access token and an Consumer key to build the twitter factory which uses to build the twitter instance.
        Throws:
        twitter4j.TwitterException - - no connection

    • Method Detail

      • getTimeline

        public java.util.List<twitter4j.Status> getTimeline(java.lang.String user)
                                             throws twitter4j.TwitterException
        Gets the most recent 20 posts from a users timeline.
        Parameters:
        user(String) - Owns the timeline which is being displayed.
        Returns:
        List(Status) - Contains the last 20 tweets of the user.
        Throws:
        twitter4j.TwitterException - - no connection

      • getTimeline

        public java.util.List<twitter4j.Status> getTimeline(java.lang.String user,
                                                    java.lang.String wordfilter)
                                             throws twitter4j.TwitterException
        Gets the timeline of the user filtered with the 2º argument of this method (filter)
        Parameters:
        user - (String) Owns the timeline which is being displayed.
        wordfilter - - (String) Chosen by the User. Tweets of the user are filtered using this argument.
        Returns:
        List (Status) - Contains the last 20 tweets based on the filter(2º argument) of the user.
        Throws:
        twitter4j.TwitterException - - no connection

      • getMoreTweetsWithoutFilter

        public java.util.List<twitter4j.Status> getMoreTweetsWithoutFilter()
                                                            throws twitter4j.TwitterException
        When you press a button "more..." it wait for the thread that is buffering the posterior info. to finish and it will begin its search again.
        Returns:
        the list of the next 40 tweets (without word filter)
        Throws:
        twitter4j.TwitterException - - no connection
